name: ZACORoboter
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
ZACO ROBOT SKILL now supports A9s/A8s/V85/V5x.
We will try to enable more robots to be compatible with Alexa in the future.
You can control your vacuum by your voice. To get started make sure you download the ZACO App and registered a ZACO App account. Your ZACO robotic vacuum has connected and online. Then, you need to enable ZACO Roboter skills and fill in the ZACO App account on the authorization page. After using Alexa to discover the device, ZACO Robot will be added.
After successful connection, please try to say:
Alexa, turn on zaco.
Alexa, turn off zaco.
